The Science & Story Behind It

The excellence of ‘Blue Marronette’ stems from its stabilized pigmentation and selected growth characteristics.

  • The intense, stable blue coloration results from selective breeding for maximum expression of crustacyanin proteins that bind with astaxanthin to create the blue pigment, a trait that has been stabilized across generations.
  • The compact size while maintaining excellent meat yield is achieved through selecting for a deep-bodied morphology with a shortened abdomen, concentrating growth in the meat-rich tail section.
  • The exceptional sweetness and clean flavor are enhanced by maintaining the crustaceans on a controlled diet free of compounds that can cause off-flavors, while selecting for individuals with efficient nutrient conversion to muscle tissue.

In short, Mini Marron ‘Blue Marronette’ is a color-stable, flavor-superior, and portion-perfect cultivar, a premium freshwater crustacean that brings the luxury of Australian marron within practical reach of urban aquaculture while offering breathtaking visual appeal.
